head.title: Martianus Capella (VIII book), Excerptum de astrologia, Abbo of Fleury

msItem.title: De nuptiis Philologiae et Mercurii. Book VIII. De astronomia
msItem.author: Martianus Capella
msItem.rubric: MARTIANI MINEI FELICIS CAPELAE INCIPIT DE ASTROLOGIA LIBER VIII de nupciis philologie
msItem.incipit: [Q]ue dum geruntur et deo[rum] sacer senatus
msItem.explicit: qui eas p[er]cutiens aut in sublime tollit aut in p[ro]fundu[m] deprimit aut in latitudine[m] declinare aut retrogradari facit.
msItem.note: interlinear glosses by the same hand, and marginal by a different one.

msItem.incipit: Acrobius ormicretes h[oc] e[st] somnioru[m] iudex u[e]l i[n]terpres
msItem.explicit: q[ui] ut multis placet autor fuit i[n] scribe[n]do hoc lib[ell]o
msItem.note: humanist hand using blank opening page (?)

msItem.author: Macrobius
msItem.title: Commentary
msItem.incipit: [I]NTER PLATONIS ET CICERONIS libros quos de r[e] p[ublica] utrumq[ue] c[on]stituisse constat…
msItem.note: many interlinear and marginal notes as in Martianus text.

msItem.author: Cicero
msItem.title: Somnium Scipionis
msItem.incipit: TESTUS SONNII. CU[M] IN AFRICA[M] UENISSEM A MANLIO CONSULE AD quartam legion[m] tribunus…
msItem.explicit: Ille discessit. ego so[m]no solutes sum.

msItem.title: Excerptum de astronomia
msItem.incipit: [D]VO SUNT extremi uertices mundi quos appellant polos
msItem.explicit: quę ad ipsu[m] usq[ue] d[e]currit accipiens.

msItem.title: Excerptio Abbonis ex higino de figuratione signorum
msItem.incipit: Deniq[ue] ut dicit pliniu[s] int[er] om[ni]a s[unt] LXXII signa…
msItem.note: continues the text from the Excerptum, no mark for starting a different/ new text.

msItem.author: Abbo of Fleury
msItem.title: Sententia Abbonis de differentia circuli et sperae
msItem.incipit: Studiosis astrologię p[ri]mo sciendu[m] e[st] p[er] geometrica[m]…
msItem.explicit: si ue[ro] mota est aliquis planetar[um] est. FIGURA AD SUPERIORA DICTA UTILIS.
msItem.note: added a circular figure of the apsides (ala Pliny) – in the edition of Thomson the other Pliny diagram ‘per zodiacum’ used (heart-rate)

msItem.author: Abbo of Fleury
msItem.title: Untitled
msItem.incipit: Deniq[ue] luna totius zodiaci signa puncta partes …
msItem.explicit: in arte[m] modo e[ss]e credimus. Similit[er] in reliquas.
msItem.note: diagram of the lunar phases on f. 73v

msItem.title: De duodecim signis
msItem.incipit: Regionem duodecim caeli in qua sol cursum suum dirigit
msItem.explicit: quę diabolicus error c[on]firmauit. Sed xps d[omi]n[u]s saluator mundi euertit.

msItem.note: Adelbodus, Epistola ad Gerbertum (Adalbold, bishop of Utrecht, d. 1026)
msItem.incipit: Domino S[ilvestro] summo pontifici et philosopho uite felicitate[m] et felicitates p[er]petuitate[m] Macrobius sup[er] somniu[m] scipioni[s] ubi loq[ui]t[ur]…
msItem.note: print in PL 140, 1103-1110, Bubnov p. 300-9. Here with abridgements (missing opening of the letter and end)
Anonymous, Commentary to the arithmetica of Boethius (?)
msItem.incipit: Sicut et in aliis in primis uidere debem[us] quę sit mat[er]ia hui[us] op[er]is. Mat[er]ia [i]g[itur] e[st] numer[us] p[er] se…
msItem.explicit: p[ost]qua[m] dix[it] unitate[m] e[ss]e ei[us]de[m] sub[stanti]e id[e]o repetit ea que tunc dixit.

msItem.author: Boethius
msItem.title: De arithmetica
msItem.incipit: Domino patricio Symmacho Boetius In dandis accipiendisque muneribus ita recte officia inter eos praecipue
msItem.explicit: hui[us] aut[em] description[n]is subt[er] exemplar adiecimus. [then another line that is not legible online]
msItem.note: followed on 127v by the usual closing diagram of geometria, arithemtica, harmonica an consonantiae.

supportDesc.condition: first folios have circular rust marks probably from previous bosses.

layoutDesc.layout: riled on dry point, no ruling for marginal glosses for Martianus.
